name: city-council-minutes
title: Data from the published City Council Minutes 1867-1940

fields.name: date_of_meeting
fields.description: The date of the City Council meeting.

fields.name: publication_page
fields.description: The page-number from the annually printet minutes.

fields.name: page_url
fields.description: Link to the original scanned page. Each link opens on the requested page of the file, but the file covers the entire City Council meeting.

fields.name: record_ids
fields.description: The original record-id(s) assigned by the City Council. Usually: serialnumber underscore year. Multiple id's are listet in square brackets. Agenda item without references to record-ids has the following format: 'U' + date of meeting + pagenumber. Blank values indicate introductory notes to a meeting.

fields.name: text
fields.description: Transcribed text from the specific agenda item dealing with the aforementioned record-id. Includes newline-characters.
